C

com.github.tommyettinger.formic - package com.github.tommyettinger.formic
 
compile(String) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.formic.FormatString
Parses a format string and returns a compiled representation of it.

F

format(Object...) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.formic.FormatString
Processes the supplied arguments through the compiled format string and returns the result as a String.
format(Appendable, Object...) - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.formic.FormatString
Processes the supplied arguments through the compiled format string and writes the result of each component directly to an Appendable
FormatString - Class in com.github.tommyettinger.formic
A pure-Java alternative to String.format(), available for GWT.

S

source() - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.formic.FormatString
The original string value that was parsed
